title: Southern Tennessee Hilton Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover the culture, beauty and musical heritage of Franklin, Tennessee, with a stay at the brand-new The Harpeth Franklin Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton, a boutique hotel perfectly positioned in the heart of historic downtown. Lovers of old-world luxury, timeless design, lavish hospitality, country music and civil war history will be in their element in this city south of Nashville.
location_description: The Harpeth Franklin Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 130 2nd Ave N, Franklin, TN 37064, United States
